## ItemTreeManager.register() method

Register a new column. Don't forget to call `unregister` on plugin exit.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(key: string, label: string, getFieldHook: typeof getFieldHookFunc | undefined, options?: {
        defaultIn?: Set<"default" | "feeds" | "feed" | string>;
        disabledIn?: Set<"default" | "feeds" | "feed" | string>;
        enabledTreeIDs?: string[];
        defaultSort?: 1 | -1;
        sortReverse?: boolean;
        flex?: number;
        width?: number;
        fixedWidth?: boolean;
        staticWidth?: boolean;
        minWidth?: number;
        iconPath?: string;
        htmlLabel?: string;
        ignoreInColumnPicker?: boolean;
        showInColumnPicker?: boolean;
        submenu?: boolean;
        columnPickerSubMenu?: boolean;
        zoteroPersist?: Set<string> | Array<string>;
        dataProvider?: (item: Zotero.Item, dataKey: string) => string;
        renderCell?: (index: number, data: string, column: ColumnOptions & {
            className: string;
        }) => HTMLSpanElement;
        renderCellHook?: (index: number, data: string, column: ColumnOptions & {
            className?: string;
        }, original: Function) => HTMLElement;
    }): Promise<any>;
```

</td><td>

typeof getFieldHookFunc \| undefined


</td><td>

Called when loading cell content. If you registered the getField hook somewhere else (in ItemBox or FieldHooks), leave it undefined.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

{ defaultIn?: Set&lt;"default" \| "feeds" \| "feed" \| string&gt;; disabledIn?: Set&lt;"default" \| "feeds" \| "feed" \| string&gt;; enabledTreeIDs?: string\[\]; defaultSort?: 1 \| -1; sortReverse?: boolean; flex?: number; width?: number; fixedWidth?: boolean; staticWidth?: boolean; minWidth?: number; iconPath?: string; htmlLabel?: string; ignoreInColumnPicker?: boolean; showInColumnPicker?: boolean; submenu?: boolean; columnPickerSubMenu?: boolean; zoteroPersist?: Set&lt;string&gt; \| Array&lt;string&gt;; dataProvider?: (item: Zotero.Item, dataKey: string) =&gt; string; renderCell?: (index: number, data: string, column: ColumnOptions &amp; { className: string; }) =&gt; HTMLSpanElement; renderCellHook?: (index: number, data: string, column: ColumnOptions &amp; { className?: string; }, original: Function) =&gt; HTMLElement; }


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ See zotero source code:chrome/content/zotero/itemTreeColumns.jsx


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Example


```ts
const itemTree = new ItemTreeTool();
await itemTree.register(
  "test",
  "new column",
  (
    field: string,
    unformatted: boolean,
    includeBaseMapped: boolean,
    item: Zotero.Item
  ) => {
    return field + String(item.id);
  },
  {
    iconPath: "chrome://zotero/skin/cross.png",
  }
);
```
